title: Cait's Head hunter skin
body: The head hunter's skin for cait is slower then her other skins (i only have head hunter and officer but played but her rag skin and officer and it is faster then head hunter) i wrote a ticket asking if you meant to do this and they told me no and to report the bug here which is what i am doing hopefully you get this fixed i would love to play my skin again

replies.body:
Hey DarkKittenXX -

Thanks for the report! I took a look at the based as compared to Head Hunter Caitlyn, and it appears as though both of these particles are playing at the same speed. The one thing I would say is that, due to Head Hunter Caitlyn's AA particle having a longer/more wispy trail, that may be why the particle is appearing slower than the base AA particle, where the trail is a bit different.
